item.description:
While you are out an about celebrating First Night festivities in Boston, be sure to stop by and welcome in 2012 while enjoying the music of Hot Like Fire (Winners of the 2011 New England Urban Music Award for Best Caribbean Band) and MAMADOU (Winners of the 2011 Boston Music Award as International Artist of the Year)!

 

You will find them at the Hynes Convention Center in Room 302, with Hot Like Fire starting at 7:30 PM, followed by MAMADOU at 9:30 PM.

 

For more information, visit http://www.firstnight....
item.name: Dance to World Music at Boston First Night - Hynes Convention Center
